DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the proposed study is to examine the phenomenon of suicidality in old age and its unique characteristics. This will be performed through observing the multigenerational aging family from the life-course perspective, which enables the researchers to address life transitions, including crises leading to suicidal tendencies.
DOC.brief_title: The Meaning of Suicidality for Older Persons With Suicidal Tendencies and Their Families
